title: Fill in the Blank - Introductions
description: Complete the conversations with the correct Spanish words and phrases

questions.question: Fill in the introduction: '_____ llamo María' (My name is María)
questions.explanation: 'Me llamo' is how you say 'my name is' in Spanish.
hints: This is a reflexive pronoun meaning 'myself'

questions.question: Complete the question: '¿Cómo _____ llamas?' (What is your name?)
questions.explanation: '¿Cómo te llamas?' is the informal way to ask someone's name.

questions.question: Say goodbye: '_____' (Goodbye)
hints: This is the most common way to say goodbye

questions.question: Complete the phrase: '_____ gusto' (Nice to meet you)
questions.explanation: 'Mucho gusto' means 'nice to meet you' - literally 'much pleasure'.
